channel.title: Can't run Moperscape!
channel.description:
Oh man when I go onto runmoparscape.bat is comes up with C:\WINDOWS\system32\cmd.exe and says 'java' is not recognized as an external command, operable program or batch file.
Please help. What should i do? PM me or post on dis forum. Thanks!

hmm still doesnt work. :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: Can't run Moperscape!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Ok for further imformation read this!

setup a classpath on your computer.
intructions:

  1. goto “start”
  2. goto “mycomputer” (right click)
  3. go down to “properties” (under step 2 ^)
  4. click the “advanced” tab
  5. click “new” (the top one!!!)
  6. under variable name type “CLASSPATH”
  7. now keep this open and goto “start” and click “run”
  8. type “c://program files/java”
  9. find which java you got.
  10. go back to the varible value and type in “SET CLASSPATH=C:program files\java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.”
  11. but put the jdk that you have. instead of _07 it might me _06 or something… ( in your java folder )
  12. clcik “ok” then “ok” under the varible thingy
  13. and then go to your “runMoparscape.bat”
  14. try to run it , if it still doesnt work try downloading the new java. (jdk update 9… i think)
  15. then if u still have problems aim me at : importracing90
    msn me at: bryanc@aol.com
    skype me at: crazyclown36

enjoy,

~bryanc~

Read full topic
